Posts.Content: I have some better advice for you! GET TO TWO doctors! Get a second opinion no matter WHAT the first one tells you!
Posts.Title: Cancer

Posts.Content: I want all of you to know how brave I think you are. My sis, my best friend was recently diagnosed with stage 3 breast cancer. She had a 9 cm tumor and three lymph nodes involved. She'd been complaining for five years to her doctor about how "hard" her breast was getting, but they missed it every single year until they finally "caught" it. It has really hit her hard as it has me. If anyone has more encouragement to provide, I would certainly appreciate it!
Posts.Title: Bravery
